SEARCH
Package userData.chat

Class Chat

java.lang.Object
userData.chat.Chat
@Component public class Chat extends Object
This class handles the chat functionality of the application.

      public void onOpen(javax.websocket.Session session, String userName, String friendUsername) throws IOException
      Opens the session and adds the users to the chat.
      Parameters:
      session - The session of the chat.
      userName - The username of the user.
      friendUsername - The username of the friend.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws an exception if the user is not found.

      public void onClose(javax.websocket.Session session) throws IOException

      Throws:
